title: U.S. Arrests Key Facilitator in North Korean IT Worker Scheme, Seizes $7.74 Million
description: The U.S. Department of Justice (DoJ) on Monday announced sweeping actions targeting the North Korean information technology (IT) worker scheme, leading to the arrest of one individual and the seizure of 29 financial accounts, 21 fraudulent websites, and nearly 200 computers.
